In the subway tunnels beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow remnants of humanity reflect the deadly attack from both outside and inside. Mutants regularly visited by the catacombs and prey on those who dared to climb onto the lifeless surface under poisoned air . Inflames the civil war that threatens to wipe out the last people . Your character - Artem , consumed with guilt , but do not lose hope. Now it depends on you our survival in this dark hour ...
